what: Stanardizing and Transforming European Football Data
title: Stanardizing and Transforming European Football Data
text: sample package created 2022 Tidy Tools Workshop Washington, DC! standardize transform European football (soccer) data compare across messy datasets. way practice using package development tooling R.

title: Stanardizing and Transforming European Football Data
text: can install development version ussie GitHub :

title: Stanardizing and Transforming European Football Data
text: example using Spain’s European Football data.
code: library(ussie) spain <- uss_make_matches(engsoccerdata::spain, "Spain") summary(spain) #>    country          tier          season          date            #>  Length:23915       1:23915   Min.   :1928   Min.   :1929-02-10   #>  Class :character   2:    0   1st Qu.:1963   1st Qu.:1964-02-08   #>  Mode  :character   3:    0   Median :1984   Median :1985-03-03   #>                     4:    0   Mean   :1981   Mean   :1981-11-05   #>                               3rd Qu.:2000   3rd Qu.:2000-11-18   #>                               Max.   :2015   Max.   :2016-05-15   #>      home             visitor            goals_home     goals_visitor   #>  Length:23915       Length:23915       Min.   : 0.000   Min.   :0.000   #>  Class :character   Class :character   1st Qu.: 1.000   1st Qu.:0.000   #>  Mode  :character   Mode  :character   Median : 2.000   Median :1.000   #>                                        Mean   : 1.833   Mean   :1.028   #>                                        3rd Qu.: 3.000   3rd Qu.:2.000   #>                                        Max.   :12.000   Max.   :8.000

title: Stanardizing and Transforming European Football Data
code: library(ussie) spain <- uss_get_matches("spain") summary(spain) #>    country          tier          season          date            #>  Length:23915       1:23915   Min.   :1928   Min.   :1929-02-10   #>  Class :character   2:    0   1st Qu.:1963   1st Qu.:1964-02-08   #>  Mode  :character   3:    0   Median :1984   Median :1985-03-03   #>                     4:    0   Mean   :1981   Mean   :1981-11-05   #>                               3rd Qu.:2000   3rd Qu.:2000-11-18   #>                               Max.   :2015   Max.   :2016-05-15   #>      home             visitor            goals_home     goals_visitor   #>  Length:23915       Length:23915       Min.   : 0.000   Min.   :0.000   #>  Class :character   Class :character   1st Qu.: 1.000   1st Qu.:0.000   #>  Mode  :character   Mode  :character   Median : 2.000   Median :1.000   #>                                        Mean   : 1.833   Mean   :1.028   #>                                        3rd Qu.: 3.000   3rd Qu.:2.000   #>                                        Max.   :12.000   Max.   :8.000

title: Get available countries — uss_countries
text: character vector containing names available countries.

title: Get a league-play tibble — uss_get_matches
text: Gets league-play data game, engsoccerdata, returning tibble standardised format.

title: Get a league-play tibble — uss_get_matches
text: country country (one Spain, Italy, Germany, England, Holland)

title: Get a league-play tibble — uss_get_matches
text: tibble columns country, date, season, tier, home, visitor, etc.

title: Get a league-play tibble — uss_get_matches
text: uss_countries() returns available choices; "england" default. function relies internal function, uss_make_matches(), parse source data.

title: Get a league-play tibble — uss_get_matches
